channel.description: Recent content in Vscode on jlog

item.title: A (shallow) Dive into VSCode Debugger
item.description: I know debugging skills are very important and one of the “must have” skills for developers. However I did not explicitly tried to learn how to use and utilize VSCode debugger effectively. While reading this during my entry to c++, I thought now was the right time to look into features VS Code gives, which were worth note taking. Today is just a shallow dive and hope to learn deeper when I need it.
